parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description:
The type of the Kubernetes cluster. Valid values:

*   5: ACK cluster
*   7: self-managed Kubernetes cluster

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 1000.

parameters.name: SubClusterType
parameters.description:
The subtype of the cluster. Valid values:

*   Ask: Serverless Kubernetes cluster
*   ManagedKubernetes: ACK cluster
